Name: Boat Basketball
About the game: Boat Basketball is a wobbly basketball arcade game, where you are a boat shooting hoops on a very wobbly sea. There is a Single Player mode with 105 levels distributed amongst 11 theme areas, as well as 52 local multiplayer levels where you can play a friend as another boat. There is also a multi-player turn-based mode, where you can play against another opponent taking turns. Featuring 11 original tracks, Boat Basketball is both chaotic and soothing, challenging and relaxing.
